title: Man who blamed girlfriend's killing on anti-Asian hate was behind murder-for-hire scheme, police say
dc:creator: Christian Martinez
description: Nelson Chia, 73, killed himself after he was arrested in the killing of Lili Xu, authorities said. He stood to gain millions from her death.
content:encoded: Nelson Chia, 73, killed himself after he was arrested in the killing of Lili Xu, authorities said. He stood to gain millions from her death.

media:content.media:description: Dublin, CA - On October 28, 2022 Nelson Chia was being booked into the Santa Rita Jail for the murder of his girlfriend Dr. Lili Xo
